messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: If you elect me as your member of parliament I will use my experience to fight to improve the quality of life and employment prospects for all of my constituents by implementing my party’s policies.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm married to Christine and we have three children. I’ve lived in Kent since 1993 working extensively in the leisure industry. I already have many years' experience as a councillor and have also been a school governor and charity director. In my spare time I enjoy clay shooting, hill walking and classic cars.

images.caption: PETER EDWARDS-DAEM in Faversham & Mid Kent
